Key Benefits: Up to ₹3 Cr financial aid, 2% lower interest, training, mentorship
Support for conversion, training, promotion, employment
Input subsidies, training, crop diversification, increased food grain production
Gokul Grams, distribution of high-quality breeds, farmer training

Objective: Promote sustainable farming using natural inputs

Scheme Name: National Scheme of Welfare of Fishermen (NSWF)
